item.title: Reimagining the American War Machine
item.description: The biggest challenge for any peacetime military is preparing for the next war.

item.title: Small Plane With 10 Onboard Goes Missing in Alaska
item.description: The Cessna, operated by Bering Air, went off the radar and lost radio contact minutes before it was scheduled to land in Nome.

item.title: Samantha Power: Killing U.S.A.I.D. Is a Win for Autocrats Everywhere
item.description: The attacks on the agency are cruel and counterproductive.
